title: Coronavirus: Iran and the US trade blame over sanctions
description: Iran has blamed US sanctions for impeding its fight against Covid-19 - but the US says that's not true.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 A field hospital set up in the Iranian city of Tabriz
With Iran one of the countries hardest hit by the coronavirus, a war of words has broken out over the impact of US sanctions.
